law.text: The commissioner may establish and from time to time amend administrative regulations relating to captive insurance companies that are necessary to enable the commissioner to carry out the provisions of KRS 304.49-010 to 304.49-230.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1614, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 14, effective July 14, 2000.
